function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of equivocal expressions in risk communication","Impact":"Misinterpretation of uncertainty and risk, leading to lack of understanding or appropriate action","Mitigation":"Use evidence-based approach to quantify uncertainty and convey it in an unambiguous way","Technologies":"Data visualization, probabilistic modeling","People":"Public, uneducated individuals","Owner":"Public health authorities, risk communicators"},{"Description":"Lack of specialized communication strategies for separate groups","Impact":"Inaccurate dissemination of information, misunderstanding of risk, and lack of appropriate action","Mitigation":"Develop specialized communication strategies for different audience segments","Technologies":"Audience segmentation tools, targeted messaging platforms","People":"Public health authorities, risk communicators","Owner":"Communication experts, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Failure to consider audience perceptions and concerns in risk communication","Impact":"Miscommunication of risk, lack of trust, and resistance to management policies","Mitigation":"Consider audience perceptions and concerns when designing risk communication strategies","Technologies":"Surveys, focus groups, sentiment analysis tools","People":"Public health authorities, risk communicators, general public","Owner":"Communication experts, public health authorities"}]}
